item.title: Rising Storm 2 Gets Surprise New Update
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Rising Storm 2: Vietnam released an unexpected update, focusing on improved server stability and proximity VoIP capabilities.
  • The update addresses bugs with muting, player audio after exiting servers, and Steam Client Headset device settings.
  • Despite positive reviews, the multiplayer game's age means servers are no longer as full.

More than seven years after launch, Antimatter Games and Tripwire Interactive have released an unexpected update for their multiplayer tactical shooter, Rising Storm 2: Vietnam. A direct sequel to 2013’s Rising Storm , which is itself a standalone expansion to Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad, Rising Storm 2 moves away from the previous games’ World War 2 setting and takes players to key locations and battles of the Vietnam War.

Lasting for nearly 20 years, the Vietnam War was a significant conflict of the Cold War whose ramifications are still felt to this day. Rising Storm 2 , a solely multiplayer experience, pits up to 64 players, representing the North and South and their allies, against one another in asymmetrical warfare. Encompassing six armies — North Vietnamese Army (PAVN) and National Liberation Front (Viet Cong), Army of the Republic of Vietnam (ARVN), United States Army and Marine Corps, Australian Army — the game launched with more than 20 maps and 50 weapons, as well as traps, tunnels, napalm, and flyable helicopters.

Despite being seven years old, Rising Storm 2 still has an active fan base, many of which were surprised to learn that Tripwire and Antimatter have released a new update, 1.6.2, for the game. Generally, the patch improves server stability, but it mostly zeroes in on Rising Storm 2 ’s proximity VoIP capabilities. This includes making sure that the system functions correctly, allowing party members to hear one another.

The update also addresses an issue where other people could still be heard talking even after exiting a server or ending a game session. And problems with muting, such as other players not being muted as intended or muted players becoming unmuted when rejoining the same server, have also been resolved. Steam Client Headset device settings should also now be automatically detected.

The tactical shooter is currently sitting at a Very Positive rating on Steam out of nearly 40,000 reviews, with some of them coming since the release of Update 1.6.2. Much of the praise mentions the game's realism, highly detailed maps, and authentic-feeling gunplay where having a strong commander in Rising Storm 2 can spell the difference between victory and defeat. Unfortunately, given the game’s age, many players have pointed out that the servers are somewhat empty, and the update didn’t address many of the small bugs that have been present since launch.

In 2019, it was announced that an alternate-history spiritual successor to Rising Storm 2 was in development. Called ’83 and set during World War 3, the project has had a few issues that caused it to be handed off by Antimatter to Blue Dot Games. After a closed alpha in December 2023 and much silence, Blue Dot announced in November 2024 that it has received further funding and development of ’83 is back on track.

Rising Storm 2: Vietnam Update 1.6.2 Patch Notes

General

  • Improved server behavior and security.

VoIP

  • Fixed general issues around muting other players as intended.
  • Addressed issues in which players after exiting a server would still hear players from the server they disconnected.
  • Addressed general issues in which players within the same party failed to hear each other.
  • Addressed an issue in which Steam Client Headset device settings were not automatically detected leading to the microphone being inactive on the server.
  • Addressed issues in which respawning players could hear active spawned players on the Spawn Point selection screen and vice versa.
  • Addressed issues in which muted players become automatically unmuted after reconnecting to the same server.
  • Addressed issues in which players could still hear players after ending a game session and closing the client.

item.title: Legend of Kingdoms Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Legend of Kingdoms Codes
  • How to Redeem Legend of Kingdoms Codes
  • How to Get More Legend of Kingdoms Codes

Legend of Kingdoms offers players an exciting Idle RPG. You have to create a team of heroes, each with unique abilities, and only by combining their abilities, you will be able to defeat the enemies on your way. To make it easier for you to progress, it is recommended that you use Legend of Kingdoms codes.

As expected, codes will reward you with useful rewards, such as Jade or Recruit Tickets. With them, you can easily replenish your party with new heroes and perhaps even SSR ones.

Updated November 12, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: As soon as we find a new code, it is immediately added here for easy access. This time, we found one new reward that will give you Recruit Tickets and Jades for free. Pay attention that this code won't last forever, so the first thing you should do when you launch the game is to redeem it. Also, c heck back here often to make sure you're always up to date with all the latest freebies.

All Legend of Kingdoms Codes

Working Legend of Kingdoms Codes

  • Double11 - Redeem this code to get x3 Recruit Ticket and x100 Jade (NEW)
  • LETSLOK - Redeem this code to get x5 Recruit Ticket, x200 Jade, and x10 Arcade Coin
  • LOKFORDC - Redeem this code to get x5 Recruit Ticket and x100 Jade

Expired Legend of Kingdoms Codes

  • Bluesky
  • Niceweather
  • HappyHoliday

At first glance, the battles in Legend of Kingdoms may seem quite easy. But when you reach the mid-game, the enemies will become much stronger, so to win, you will need to create suitable teams based on the synergy of the characters' skills and factions. As such, players will need a lot of Recruit Tickets, which can be obtained using Legend of Kingdoms codes.

Each code offers a number of various rewards. Often, these are large amounts of Jade. But sometimes you will claim Arcade Coins and Recruit Tickets. However, they are valid for a limited time, so we recommend you hurry to use them.

How to Redeem Legend of Kingdoms Codes

After you have found out what free goodies are contained in Legend of Kingdoms codes, you should learn how to redeem them. It is not more difficult to do than in other mobile RPG games. Just follow these steps:

  • Launch Legend of Kingdoms .
  • Then complete the tutorial if you have not done so before. After that, click on your profile icon in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • Finally, click on the Gift Code button and enter the code.
  • You will only need to tap on the Confirm button to claim the reward.

How to Get More Legend of Kingdoms Codes

Just like with Roblox codes, to get more new Legend of Kingdoms codes, players need to visit the official developer pages. There you will find all the latest news, including updates and free goodies:

  • Legend of Kingdoms Facebook page
  • Legend of Kingdoms Discord server

Legend of Kingdoms is available on mobile devices.

item.title: One Punch Man: The Strongest Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • One Punch Man: The Strongest Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in One Punch Man: The Strongest
  • One Punch Man: The Strongest Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Mobile Anime Games Like One Punch Man: The Strongest
  • About the One Punch Man: The Strongest Developers

One Punch Man: The Strongest is a turn-based game based on the popular anime with the same name. This article was created to provide players with codes for the game. The game's developers ensure that One Punch Man: The Strongest codes expire fast, so check below for all of the latest codes and be sure to redeem them before it's too late.

Updated November 12, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This guide is designed to bring you fresh codes quickly. Check back soon and see if any new rewards have been added.

One Punch Man: The Strongest Codes

All Active One Punch Man: The Strongest Codes

  • OPM777 - Enter this code to get rewards.

How to Redeem Codes in One Punch Man: The Strongest

The process of redeeming codes in One Punch Man: The Strongest is not difficult and is similar to most other mobile games. However, if players still need help, they can follow the step-by-step instructions below:

  • First, launch the game.
  • Then, find and tap on the profile picture.
  • Tap on the Gift Code button.
  • Enter or paste the above-mentioned active code into the appropriate field.
  • Tap Confirm to redeem the code.

One Punch Man: The Strongest Tips and Tricks

  • Choose the Newest Server: Always start on the newest server to stay competitive with others and limit their progress.
  • Level Up Fast: Focus on leveling account quickly by completing daily challenges, aiming for a daily score of 100 for valuable rewards.
  • Smart Stamina Use: Spend stamina wisely on Boss challenges, qualifications, and character evolution materials to maximize rewards.
  • Strategic Gem Spending: Save gems for Limited vouchers to summon powerful limited characters. Prioritize these over other purchases.
  • Team Building: Assemble a balanced team with core characters for energy and survivability, while considering tank units.
  • Gear Up Efficiently: Focus on gear stats over sets, save vouchers until level 78, and use star ascension cards on purple or orange gears.

The Best Mobile Anime Games Like One Punch Man: The Strongest

One Punch Man: The Strongest offers tons of characters and innovative mechanics. However, there are plenty of equally cool anime games that are based on different anime series. With this in mind, those looking to change things up a bit can find five of the best anime games like One Punch Man: The Strongest :

  • Bleach Blood War
  • Outerplane
  • The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross
  • DS - Blade of Hashira
  • One Piece Treasure

About the One Punch Man: The Strongest Developers

One Punch Man: The Strongest is officially authorized by the Japanese production committee and supervised by Shueisha, the publisher of the original manga. The game is developed by PlayCrab, a Chinese game studio that specializes in turn-based strategy and RPG games, and published by FingerFun Limited, a Hong Kong-based game company that focuses on mobile games for the Southeast Asian market.

One Punch Man: The Strongest is available on iOS and Android.

item.title: Ultimate Golf Promo Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
There are many golf fans around the world, but this is a rather expensive hobby, so it is not available to everyone. Fortunately, game developers understand this very well, and that's why you can play Ultimate Golf on your phone. Like many other mobile games, you can unlock and upgrade your equipment. Luckily, you can redeem Ultimate Golf codes to get some equipment for free.

Updated November 12, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Good news - we have new codes for you. Don't forget to check them out and use them all.

All Ultimate Golf Codes

Although there are few active codes presently, they will give you a good start in Ultimate Golf . By redeeming one of the codes, you will receive a Gold Bag with a high chance of having an epic club, as well as many balls and pins. Below you will find a list of all active codes, but redeem them as soon as possible because they are expiring rapidly.

Active Codes

  • Back2golf - Enter this code to get a Golf Bag. (NEW)
  • playpebble - Enter this code to get a Golf Bag. (NEW)
  • welcome0422 - Enter this code to get a Golf Bag.
  • Player1 - Enter this code to get some Golf Pins.

Expired Codes

  • NYJ
  • SF
  • zach8
  • PALMER24
  • TOMCAT
  • TEEREX
  • BIGEASY
  • THEDON
  • HAPPY
  • BOB
  • CHUBBS
  • SHOOTER
  • Cooper
  • welcome0422
  • jared23
  • erelic23
  • zach8
  • THEBEAST23
  • ZACH22
  • BOOSTME
  • ZENDO77
  • YAY10K
  • Full18
  • Blossom23
  • Lemonade18
  • Marv31
  • SEZAZD3X
  • SWING

How to Redeem Ultimate Golf Codes

Many mobile game developers add the option of redeeming codes to attract interest in their projects. To make it easy for players to find this option, it is usually located in the profile menu. In Ultimate Golf , it's easy to redeem codes, but you won't find them in the profile menu, so you'll have to spend some time exploring the game's HUD. To help you with this, we have created a guide that will show you how to redeem codes in Ultimate Golf .

  • Launch Ultimate Golf .
  • Finish the tutorial and go to the Home tab in the main menu of the game.
  • Under the Play Golf button, you will see a bright orange Free Rewards button. Press it.
  • At the bottom of the screen, you will see the Promo Code. Press Enter to the right of this inscription.
  • A new window will open with a code field. You can either manually enter the code there, or copy it from our list of active codes and click the Paste button below the field.
  • Then press Submit to redeem the code.

How to Get More Ultimate Golf Codes

Sometimes the newest codes are challenging to find and players have to spend a lot of time searching for good sources of information. If you want to be the first to receive new promo codes, you should bookmark this page because we update it monthly. If you are interested in official information from the developers, you can visit Ultimate Golf! page in X. There, you will find not only active promo codes but also information about various updates and events.

Ultimate Golf is available on mobile.
